title: Bug 113730Wrong relationship between cascading parameters
description: 1.Create a datasource(sample), create a dataset(select  fromCLASSICMODELS.ORDERS).2.Create a cascading parameter,the parent parameter is ORDERNUMBER, the childparameter is ORDERDATE.3.Pull the two parameters to the layout to preview. Click parameter dialog tochange the values of the parameter, when change the parent parameter, the childparameter will not change to the corresponding value, while keep the lastselected value.
